de.weltraumschaf.dht.msg

Interface Message<B>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseMessage, ProtocollMessage, ProtocollMessage.FindNodeMessage, ProtocollMessage.FindValueMessage, ProtocollMessage.PingMessage, ProtocollMessage.StoreMessage, TextMessage

    public interface Message<B>
    Represents a message send over the network.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      B getBody()
      Get the message body.
      NetworkAddress getFrom()
      From where the message came.
      NetworkAddress getTo()
      The message receiver.
      MessageType getType() 
      boolean isUnread()
      Whether the message is unread or not.
      void markAsRead()
      Mark the message as read.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrom

        NetworkAddress getFrom()
        From where the message came.
        Returns:
        never null

      • getTo

        NetworkAddress getTo()
        The message receiver.
        Returns:
        never null

      • getBody

        B getBody()
        Get the message body.
        Returns:
        never null

      • markAsRead

        void markAsRead()
        Mark the message as read. Subsequent calls has no effect.

      • isUnread

        boolean isUnread()
        Whether the message is unread or not. This method must return true until first invocation of markAsRead().
        Returns:
        true if message is unread, else false

      • getType

        MessageType getType()
